title: Anno 1404 - Dawn of Discovery (MULTi4) [Crack Included]

Anno 1404 - Dawn of discovery [Multi 4 - Eng - Ita - Spa - Fr]

ANNO 1404 is the building-strategy game which features a deep economy, wide game world and dynamic game play which continuously challenge the players strategical management skills.


The discovery of the ancient oriental nation inspires your creative vision for your own grandiose metropolis, as you carefully raise monumental cities and develop an idealized historical empire.
